about_how_sub: A simple workflow designed for procurement speed and credibility.
about_modal_desc: BTrustOn helps buyers and contractors reduce sourcing risk by surfacing what matters: verification status, project references, certificates, and assets—on one screen.
about_modal_sub: Discover the right supplier faster—with clear, verifiable signals.
about_modal_tagline: A trust layer for industrial sourcing—built on proof, not posts.
about_not_1: Not a social feed. Updates are structured signals that deep-link to the underlying proof.
about_not_2: Not a guarantee. Buyers should always perform their own due diligence.
about_not_3: Not spam-friendly. The platform is designed to stay premium and procurement-focused.
about_pillar_assets_desc: Clear inventories and capabilities (equipment, facilities, systems) so sourcing decisions are based on operational reality.
about_pillar_refs_desc: Structured references that let buyers understand where a supplier has delivered—without long pitches or marketing PDFs.
about_pillar_verified_desc: A visible trust signal that indicates a company has passed an admin review process. Verification is shown to everyone.
about_step1_desc: Add core services and the essentials buyers need to qualify you.
about_step2_desc: Projects, certificates, and assets become your trust stack.
about_step3_desc: Submit your Company ID (e.g., VKN) for admin review.
about_step4_desc: Send quote requests and find qualified partners faster.
attachment_to_view_new_tab: Use Open to view this file in a new tab.
celebration_desc: Congratulations! Your business documentation has been approved. You now have the
cropper_help: Drag to reposition, use the handles to zoom.
hero_desc: Bring your corporate references, certificates, and technical capabilities into a single profile—show your operational strength and grow faster.
hero_proof: Build strategic connections with industry leaders on a foundation of transparency and trust.
how_b1_d: Filter by sector, location, services, projects, assets.
how_b2_d: Review project references, certificates, and asset lists.
how_b3_d: Create a free account to bookmark companies and keep private notes for your team.
how_b4_d: After joining, follow companies to get notified on new posts, request quotes, and message via inbox.
how_b5_d: Contact the right partner with one request.
how_c1_d: Add services, sectors, location, and key contacts.
how_c2_d: Publish references and industrial inventory to show capability.
how_c3_d: Share progress, milestones, and new assets in a structured format.
how_feature_saved_desc: Save companies and add private notes for follow-up.
how_feature_updates_desc: Structured posts keep profiles active and easier to evaluate.
how_feature_verified_desc: Buyers spot verified partners instantly in search.
how_step1_desc: Add your company details, sectors, core services, assets and project highlights.
how_step2_desc: Send verification requests to past clients and partners to build a verified track record.
how_step3_desc: Verified profiles and clear proof can increase visibility in search and bring more qualified leads.
how_sub: A simple workflow for companies and buyers—prove capability, get verified, and be found fast.
how_v1_d: Provide your business ID and request a review.
how_v2_d: We check consistency and approve verified companies.
how_v3_d: Verified badge becomes visible to everyone.
how_verif_sub: A quick review to unlock the blue tick.
join_acknowledge:
.
      I acknowledge that BTrustOn is a verification platform and does not guarantee the performance of any listed company.

price_pro_6: Easier access for buyers after verification
price_pro_tag: For suppliers who want to win more work.
pricing_free_b1: Create a company profile and get discovered.
pricing_free_b2: Browse verified partners and view public proof.
pricing_free_b3: Receive quote requests and connect with buyers.
pricing_free_b4: Limited uploads & features compared to Pro.
pricing_modal_sub: Simple plans designed for business—no noise.
pricing_notes: Notes: Prices are shown in USD. Taxes may apply depending on jurisdiction. Payments and invoicing are handled via our payment provider.
pricing_pro_b2: Structured company updates that deep-link to proof.
pricing_pro_b3: Request verification (admin review) and display trust signals.
pricing_pro_b4: Priority visibility and premium profile features.
pricing_sub: Start free. Try Pro free for 3 months—no card required. Then $19/month.
pricing_trials_desc: If you haven’t used a trial yet, joining from a Pro CTA will start your Pro Trial automatically. If your trial has ended, you can activate Pro by paying.
privacy_auto_1: Basic device and usage data (pages viewed, interactions, timestamps).
privacy_auto_2: Log data for security, fraud prevention, and reliability.
privacy_auto_3: Cookies/local storage for session and preferences (e.g., language).
privacy_choices_1: Access and update your company profile information.
privacy_choices_2: Control what proof you upload and keep public.
privacy_choices_3: Request data export or deletion (subject to legal limits).
privacy_contact_body: For privacy requests, please contact support via the platform. If you provide personal data belonging to others (e.g., employee/contact details), you confirm you have the right to share it.
privacy_provide_1: Company profile details (name, sector, business type, country/city).
privacy_provide_2: Proof content (projects, certificates, assets) you choose to upload.
privacy_provide_3: Verification data (e.g., Company ID / VKN) submitted for review.
privacy_provide_4: Messages such as quote requests and support inquiries.
privacy_retention_body: We keep data as long as necessary to provide the service, meet legal requirements, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. You may request deletion where applicable.
privacy_share_body: We may share information with vendors who process data on our behalf (e.g., infrastructure, storage, analytics, payment processing) and with authorities if required by law. Company profile information and uploaded proof may be visible to other users depending on your platform settings.
privacy_summary_body: We collect the information needed to run a B2B verification and discovery platform. We do not sell personal data. We may share data with service providers that help us operate the platform (hosting, storage, analytics, payments).
privacy_use_1: To create and display company profiles and trust signals.
privacy_use_2: To run verification workflows and protect platform integrity.
privacy_use_3: To enable messaging and quote requests between companies.
privacy_use_4: To improve performance, analytics, and product experience.
privacy_use_5: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms.
results_none_found: No companies found matching your criteria.
results_showcase_note_free: Verified companies rotate here — Go Pro to unlock updates visibility.
score_info_main: Based on verification status and the strength of your proof (projects, certificates, assets).
score_info_verify: Add more proof to be easier to evaluate in search.
showcase_pro_note: Verified partners rotate here — Go Pro to unlock updates visibility.
toast_pro_only: Posting updates is a Pro feature.
ui_btruston_is_a_b2b_discovery_and_013b5: BTrustOn is a B2B discovery and verification platform. We are not a party to transactions between companies and we do not guarantee performance, quality, safety, or compliance of any listed company.
ui_by_using_the_platform_you_agree_9f804: By using the platform, you agree to these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
ui_comma_separated_keywords_e_g_epc_4114: Comma separated keywords. e.g. EPC, Excavation, Maintenance
ui_complete_all_fields_to_strengthe_cd76: Complete all fields to strengthen your profile.
ui_do_not_upload_confidential_infor_f603: Do not upload confidential information you cannot share publicly.
ui_do_you_really_want_to_delete_thi_2fe6: Do you really want to delete this item? This process cannot be undone.
ui_examples_epc_drilling_crushing_s_a0e5: Examples: EPC, Drilling, Crushing & Screening, Equipment Rental, Maintenance, Engineering Design.

ui_no_harassment_hate_or_unlawful_c_b287: No harassment, hate, or unlawful content.
ui_no_saved_companies_yet_use_the_b_bc15: No saved companies yet. Use the bookmark icon on company cards to save.
ui_no_scraping_reverse_engineering_67f79: No scraping, reverse engineering, or abuse of platform systems.
ui_optional_introduce_the_person_be_6b06: Optional: Introduce the person behind the business.
ui_payments_are_processed_by_a_thir_9eb8: Payments are processed by a third-party provider; we do not store full card details.
ui_pricing_and_included_features_ma_24bb: Pricing and included features may change with notice.
ui_pro_features_may_include_unlimit_8a42: Pro features may include unlimited uploads, structured updates, and premium visibility. Trial access may be available once per company/account. After a trial ends, paid subscription may be required to continue Pro features.
ui_submit_your_official_tax_details_4f89: Submit your official tax details. Our compliance team will verify within 24h.
ui_the_platform_is_provided_as_is_a_27eb: The platform is provided “as is” and “as available”. We disclaim warranties to the maximum extent permitted by law, including fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement.
ui_these_terms_are_governed_by_the_4e476: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Istanbul (Çağlayan), unless mandatory law requires otherwise.
ui_this_company_hasn_t_listed_any_a_410c: This company hasn’t listed any assets yet.
ui_tip_choose_a_clear_image_we_ll_c_d09c: Tip: Choose a clear image. We'll crop it to fit.
ui_tip_click_the_document_button_to_8bfd: Tip: Click the document button to open the attached file (PDF, Excel, etc.).
ui_to_maximize_your_visibility_and_80eaa: to maximize your visibility and reach more partners.
ui_to_reorder_and_click_to_mark_any_ed00: to reorder, and click ⭐ to mark any item as
ui_to_the_maximum_extent_permitted_72276: To the maximum extent permitted by law, BTrustOn will not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages. Our total liability for any claim is limited to the amount you paid to us in the 12 months prior to the event giving rise to the claim.
ui_verification_badges_are_trust_si_08c4: Verification badges are trust signals based on review processes—not warranties.
ui_verification_indicates_that_cert_6388: Verification indicates that certain submitted information has been reviewed. Verification can be suspended or removed if we detect inconsistency, misuse, or policy violations. Verification does not replace buyer due diligence.
ui_verified_profiles_rank_higher_in_4967: Verified profiles rank higher in search results.
ui_we_may_suspend_or_terminate_acco_cb77: We may suspend or terminate accounts for violations or to protect platform integrity. You may stop using the platform at any time.
ui_you_are_responsible_for_maintain_a443: You are responsible for maintaining account security and all activity under your account. Notify us promptly of unauthorized use.
ui_you_are_responsible_for_your_con_c6f1: You are responsible for your content and for conducting your own due diligence.
ui_you_must_be_able_to_form_a_bindi_a1f9: You must be able to form a binding contract in your jurisdiction. If you create or manage a company profile, you represent you have authority to act on behalf of that entity.
ui_you_must_have_the_rights_to_uplo_2122: You must have the rights to upload and display the materials.
ui_you_retain_ownership_of_your_con_f7f8: You retain ownership of your content (logos, documents, project references, asset lists, certificates). By uploading, you grant BTrustOn a non-exclusive license to host, display, and distribute it within the platform for discovery and verification purposes.

help_reg_default: Use your official registration / tax entity number. You can also add a registry link.

help_reg_eu: Europe: Use your company registration number (trade register / VAT / national ID).
help_reg_latam: South America: Use your official company registration / tax ID.
